channel.title: 🏢 School of Computer Science, Carleton University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 School of Computer Science, Carleton University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Reinforcement Learning Guided Semi-Supervised Learning
item.description: Reinforcement Learning guides a novel semi-supervised learning method, improving model performance by adaptively balancing labeled and unlabeled data.
